'''Paper''' is an item crafted from [[sugar cane]], required for crafting [[book]]s, [[map]]s, [[cartography table]]s, [[firework rocket]]s and [[banner pattern]]s.

== Obtaining ==
=== Generated loot ===
{{LootChestItem|paper}}

=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting
|A2= Sugar Cane |B2= Sugar Cane |C2= Sugar Cane
|Output= Paper,3
|type= Miscellaneous
}}

=== Villager gifts ===
{{IN|Java}}, cartographer [[villager]]s may give paper to [[player]]s with the [[Hero of the Village]] effect.

== Usage ==
=== Crafting ingredient ===
{{crafting usage}}

=== Cartography table usage ===
Paper can be used to zoom out a [[map]] by one level in a [[cartography table]]. This method of zooming out map is 8 times more efficient than using a [[crafting table]]. {{IN|bedrock}}, it can also be used to create an empty map or an empty locator map. This is also cheaper than the equivalent crafting recipes.
